cm.model
Class StatLibrary

java.lang.Object
  cm.model.StatLibrary

public class StatLibrary
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a statblock library to store creature information.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Rinehart <gomamon2k at yahoo.com>

add

public java.lang.Boolean add(Stats stats,

Add a statblock to the library.

Parameters:
stats - the statblock
overwrite - if true, overwrite any existing statblock with the provided statblock's handle
Returns:
true on successful addition

Reads a statblock library from an XML file.

Parameters:
